post.author: Admin
post.title: A Note of Thanks
post.description: Dear Band Families, As a follow up to our email titled: ‘Today’s News’, the Boosters would like to e
post.content:
Dear Band Families,

As a follow up to our email titled: ‘Today’s News’, the Boosters would like to extend a HUGE THANK YOU to all the bandos, their families and friends that stepped up to help us out on Sunday and Monday! We had a record turnout of volunteers!

We hope that you had a fantastic time, watched the Air Show and were able to meet other band families in the process.

If you have any pictures you would like to share, please post them to the North Royalton Band Booster website…. We would love to see them!

Enjoy your week and see you at our first HOME football game this Friday.

Amanda Kost
President
